author: Dr15Jones
body:
The order in which endLuminosityBlock and endLuminosityBlockProduce
are called by the framework was reversed to match the behavior in
global modules. This required moving the computation from one function
to the other function.

In addition
-many member data were converted to local variables
-member data were marked as 'const' if possible
-switched to using edm::EDPutTokenT
These changes would make it easy to convert this module to a global
module in the future. This was not done now because of the output file.
title: Modernized RawPCCProducer
